name: The Flying Finish
description:
- A submission for the B&W Jam

Chase a flying flag! In this run-and-jump game, you'll have to keep the flag on screen while you try to keep your feet on the ground. 

Controls: A, D to move left and right, SPACE to jump

NOTE: in the web version, the game will look better in fullscreen. Press the little button on the bottom right to do this.
